title: Dress up for UIC Halloween Haunt Oct. 28 (University of Illinois at Chicago)
text: ( Source : University of Illinois at Chicago ) Students are encouraged to wear costumes to Halloween Haunt Oct. 28. Play glow-in-the-dark mini-golf or test your bravery at Halloween Haunt Oct. 28. 'It'll be a costume kind of night, so everyone
